The only reason I am commenting is because I finally figured out why Dr. Cox was bald. Although we probably all realized it at the same time this week Dr. Cox is bald because he has Raynaud's syndrome. If you look carefully every time he is disgusted with someone (usually the second nurse lady) you will notice his ears get very red. This is a condition in which the blood vessels constrict reducing blood flow to his extremities resulting in lack of blood

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by comparison to Disney’s original fairy tales, thanks to computer graphics. The biggest mistake to my point of view is a pretty traditional one, that any educated viewer would know “A forewarned is a forearmed”. The worst thing found is the casting of the roles and that of the actors
